issue.title: [R] Autobrew + AWS sdk dependency
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15249](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15249). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The homebrew-r-autobrew nightly job has been failing since the AWS SDK version was bumped in the autobrew/homebrew-core repo. 

I don't think we can move to this newer version yet due to https://github.com/aws/aws-sdk-cpp/issues/1809 so I've opened https://github.com/autobrew/homebrew-core/issues/97 to see if Jeroen has better/different ideas about how to work around this.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15249?focusedCommentId=17474942) by Jonathan Keane (jonkeane):*
Issue resolved by pull request 12079
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12079>
